snippet: Regulators need to crack down on payday lenders’ raiding checking accounts.
abstract: Editorial calls on regulators to crack down on payday lenders by prohibiting banks from giving such lenders access to automatic payment system in states where predatory, high-interest loans are illegal; urges passing of Safe Lending Act, which requires all online lenders to comply with state laws that provide stronger consumer protections than federal statues.
lead_paragraph: Regulators need to crack down on payday lenders’ raiding checking accounts.
